attributes.action: Close Nurseries in Tier 4 areas -Precausions should be taken to nurseries too.
attributes.additional_details: Nurseries should NOT be excluded in the precaution action from the government and society. It should be closed while this high risk continues.
attributes.background: Nurseries should be closed for the risk of new variant which is more transmissible. Closing of education institutions should include nurseries, where littleone can barely refrain themselves to touch each other. They could simply carry the virus pass to other children who will bring it back to family

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
